name: Forgotten Mines (Xbun)
description:
Warning

Contains: 

  • Jumpscare
  • Narrow spaces
  • Spider
  • First game we've ever made

Description

Your car fell down into a cliff and you found yourself next to your car in a middle of the night. While you wandering around you found a cave in front of you. Maybe there's something useful in there.

Controls

W, A, S, D to walk

Left Shift + walk to run

Press E to interact with items

Click Left mouse to fire weapon.
